mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, M_EMAIL, TITLE, CONTENT, IMPORTANT, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(FINISH_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS FINISH_DATE, LOCATION, G_NUM FROM SCHEDULES WHERE G_NUM=#{g_num} AND FINISH_DATE>SYSDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULES VALUES(NVL((SELECT MAX(SEQ)+1 FROM SCHEDULES),1),#{m_email},#{title},#{content},#{important},#{start_date},#{finish_date},#{location},#{g_num})
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, M_EMAIL, TITLE, CONTENT, IMPORTANT, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(FINISH_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS FINISH_DATE, LOCATION, G_NUM FROM SCHEDULES WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHEDULES SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, IMPORTANT=#{important}, START_DATE=#{start_date}, FINISH_DATE=#{finish_date}, LOCATION=#{location} WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
